mapper.sql: gf_creditcard.gf_creditCard_id, gf_creditcard.account_id, product.product_name AS productId , gf_creditcard.name, gf_creditcard.id_card_No, gf_creditcard.email, gf_creditcard.mobile, gf_creditcard.company_name, gf_creditcard.work_prov_id, gf_creditcard.work_prov_name, gf_creditcard.work_city_id, gf_creditcard.work_city_name, gf_creditcard.work_city_area_id, gf_creditcard.work_city_area_name, gf_creditcard.work_address, gf_creditcard.live_prov_id, gf_creditcard.live_prov_name, gf_creditcard.live_city_id, gf_creditcard.live_city_name, gf_creditcard.live_city_area_id, gf_creditcard.live_city_area_name, gf_creditcard.live_address, gf_creditcard.remark, gf_creditcard.create_man, gf_creditcard.create_time, gf_creditcard.modify_man, gf_creditcard.modify_time, gf_creditcard.state
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM gf_creditcard LEFT JOIN product ON gf_creditcard.product_id = product.`product_id` where gf_creditCard_id = #{arg0} GROUP BY gf_creditcard.gf_creditCard_id

SELECT
FROM gf_creditcard LEFT JOIN product ON gf_creditcard.product_id = product.`product_id` where 1=1
GROUP BY gf_creditcard.gf_creditCard_id order by create_time desc
mapper.insert: insert into gf_creditcard (gf_creditCard_id, account_id, product_id, name, id_card_no, email, mobile, company_name, work_prov_id, work_prov_name, work_city_id, work_city_name, work_city_area_id, work_city_area_name, work_address, live_prov_id, live_prov_name, live_city_id, live_city_name, live_city_area_id, live_city_area_name, live_address, remark, create_man, create_time, modify_man, modify_time, state) values (#{gfCreditCardId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{accountId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{productId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{idCardNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{companyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{workProvId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{workProvName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{workCityId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{workCityName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{workCityAreaId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{workCityAreaName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{workAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{liveProvId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{liveProvName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{liveCityId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{liveCityName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{liveCityAreaId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{liveCityAreaName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{liveAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createMan,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifyMan,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update:
update gf_creditcard
gf_creditCard_id = #{gfCreditCardId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
account_id = #{accountId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
product_id = #{productId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
id_card_no = #{idCardNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mobile = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
company_name = #{companyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
work_prov_id = #{workProvId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
work_prov_name = #{workProvName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
work_city_id = #{workCityId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
work_city_name = #{workCityName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
work_city_area_id = #{workCityAreaId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
work_city_area_name = #{workCityAreaName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
work_address = #{workAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
live_prov_id = #{liveProvId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
live_prov_name = #{liveProvName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
live_city_id = #{liveCityId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
live_city_name = #{liveCityName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
live_city_area_id = #{liveCityAreaId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
live_city_area_name = #{liveCityAreaName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
live_address = #{liveAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_man = #{createMan,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
modify_man = #{modifyMan,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
modify_time = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
state = #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where gf_creditCard_id = #{gfCreditCardId}
